summary: A group of Satanic hippies wreak havoc on a small town where a young boy, whose sister and grandfather were victimized by them, tries to get even - with deadly results.
cast: Bhaskar Roy Chowdhury|Jadin Wong|Rhonda Fultz|George Patterson|Riley Mills|John Damon|Elizabeth Marner-Brooks|Richard Bowler|Tyde Kierney|Iris Brooks|Alex Mann|Bruno Damon|Mike Gentry|David E. Durston|Arlene Farber|Lynn Lowry
director: Director: David E. Durston (as David Durston)
title: Me bebo tu sangre
